words.imageCue: shiny red apple with a single green leaf on a sunny windowsill

english.title: Apple
english.summary: Crunchy red fruit kids see in storybooks.
english.description: Teach the word "apple" with color cues and tasting actions.

examples.en: I crunch a sweet apple at snack time.
examples.zh: 点心时间我咬一口甜苹果。

examples.en: The apple is round and shiny.

seo.description: Learn how to say and use the word apple with bilingual narration.

faq.question_en: How do I explain "apple" to first graders?
faq.answer_en: Connect to snack time, colors, and crunchy sounds.
faq.answer_zh: 结合零食时间、颜色和咬下去的咔嚓声来讲。

chinese.title: 苹果
chinese.summary: 红红脆脆，孩子熟悉的水果。
chinese.description: 从颜色、形状和味道解释“苹果”这个单词。

words.imageCue: friendly sun doodle rising over playground

english.title: Sun
english.summary: Warm yellow circle lighting the playground.
english.description: Teach how the sun warms us and lights the day.

examples.en: The sun wakes me up in the morning.
We wear hats when the sun is bright.
examples.zh: 太阳很亮时我们戴帽子。

quiz.question: What do we call the bright ball in the sky?

seo.description: Short bilingual lesson about the sun for kids.

faq.question_en: Why teach the sun in English lessons?
faq.answer_en: It connects to weather chats and daily routines.
faq.answer_zh: 它和天气、日常作息紧密相关。

chinese.title: 太阳
chinese.summary: 温暖的黄太阳照亮操场。
chinese.description: 讲太阳如何带来光和暖。

english.title: Jump
english.summary: Action word kids act out in PE class.
english.description: Use movement and sound effects to show "jump".

seo.description: Teach verbs like jump with bilingual cues.

faq.answer_en: Use slow motion hops and excited faces.
faq.answer_zh: 让孩子慢动作跳跃，表情兴奋。

words.imageCue: kid drawing smiley faces with chalk

english.title: Happy
english.summary: Feelings word tied to smiles and hugs.
english.description: Connect "happy" to body language and sharing.

examples.en: I feel happy when mom hugs me.

seo.description: Emotions vocabulary lesson with English narration.

faq.question_en: How to add SEL to "happy" lessons?
faq.answer_en: Ask students to share happy moments while repeating the word.
faq.answer_zh: 让孩子说说快乐瞬间并重复单词。

chinese.title: 开心
chinese.summary: 笑脸和拥抱让孩子理解 happy。

english.title: Blue
english.summary: Color word tied to sky and calm waves.
english.description: Show everyday blue objects and feelings.

seo.description: Teach the color blue with bilingual prompts.

faq.answer_en: Use scarves, sky videos, and crayons.
faq.answer_zh: 用丝巾、天空视频和蜡笔。

english.title: Teacher
english.summary: Person who helps us learn every day.
english.description: Focus on caring actions and classroom routines.

examples.en: The teacher reads us a story.

faq.question_en: How to honor teachers in the script?
faq.answer_en: Describe gentle coaching moments and gratitude.

chinese.title: 老师
chinese.description: 强调老师的关怀和引导。

english.title: Friend
english.summary: People we share with and trust.

examples.en: We help a friend tie shoes.

english.title: Music
english.summary: Sounds that make us dance and clap.

examples.zh: 我们在课堂上演奏音乐。

faq.answer_en: Use rhythm sticks, dancing kids, and notes.
faq.question_zh: 音乐主题适合哪些画面？
faq.answer_zh: 节奏棒、跳舞的孩子和音符。

english.title: Robot
english.summary: Helper machine kids build from boxes.

examples.en: The robot helps pick up blocks.
We pretend to talk like robots.

seo.description: Introduce STEM word robot with bilingual hook.

faq.question_en: How to visualize robots for kids?
faq.answer_en: Cardboard builds, friendly lights, big buttons.
faq.question_zh: 怎样在画面展示机器人？
faq.answer_zh: 用纸箱制作、彩灯和大按钮。

words.imageCue: playful panda plush in bamboo corner

english.title: Panda
english.summary: Black and white bear kids adore.
english.description: Teach facts about pandas eating bamboo.

faq.question_en: How to show pandas on screen?
faq.answer_en: Use plush toys, bamboo props, and calm forests.
faq.answer_zh: 使用玩偶、竹子和安静森林。

english.title: Be verbs: is / am / are
english.summary: Link each form to simple subjects.
english.description: Kids practice matching pronouns with the right "be" verb.

faq.answer_en: Use name tags, chants, and quick checks.
faq.question_zh: 怎么让 be 动词课堂有趣？
faq.answer_zh: 用名牌、口号和即时反馈。

chinese.title: be 动词 is/am/are
chinese.summary: 和主语搭配的三个形式。

rule.title: Use is / am / are
rule.overview: Match short sentences with the right helper verb.
steps: IS goes with he/she/it and single nouns.
Read the subject first, then pick the helper.

examples.zh: She is my friend.（她是我的朋友）
They are ready.（他们准备好了）

quiz.question: Fill in the blank: They __ playing.

english.title: This vs. That
english.summary: Demonstrate near and far with props.
english.description: Teach pointing words using camera distance.

faq.question_en: How to show distance on camera?
faq.answer_en: Use dolly shots and forced perspective props.
faq.answer_zh: 用推拉镜头和大小道具。

chinese.title: this / that
chinese.summary: 近的用 this，远的用 that。

rule.title: Pointing words
rule.overview: Use THIS for items close to you and THAT for items farther away.
steps: Hold the item near your chest to say THIS.
Stretch your arm or zoom out for THAT.
Match nouns: this book, that kite.
Ask questions: What's this? What's that?

examples.zh: This is my pen.（这是我的笔）
That is a big kite.（那是一只大风筝）

quiz.question: _____ is my backpack (right next to me).
